summary: This mod adds an armor set to the game, the Drake Knight Armor which was originally made for Oblivion by Jojjo and ported into Skyrim by me (SkyrimForDaWin). For Male and Female characters.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/Tittle02_zpsdb9f4586.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5]Description[/size][/b]

This mod adds an armor set to the game, the "Drake Knight Armor" which was originally made for Oblivion by Jojjo and ported into Skyrim by me (SkyrimForDaWin). For Male and Female characters.
The armor is listed under the dragon section of the crafting lists and is using the same materials and stats of the DragonBone set, including the keywords so it should work fine with SkyRe.
The armor is made up with the 4 main pieces...
- DrakeKnight Boots
- DrakeKnight Cuirass
- DrakeKnight Gauntlets
- DrakeKnight Helmet (8 Variants)

The helmet variants are all the same for the male version but for females it will have a hairstyle that is included in the "Apachii SkyHair" mod, see Recommended Mods Section for link.
The hairstyle is in the following colours...
- Black (BLK)
- Blonde (BL)
- Blonde Dark (BL D)
- Brunette (BR)
- Brunette Dark (BR D)
- Grey (GR)
- Red (RE)
- Also includes a version without hair

The armor has no weight sliders, the female version is shaped to UNP 100 weight, the male version is a vanilla 0 weight.. I used those body shapes and weights because they best fit the original from oblivion and I didn't want to alter the shape drastically.

The sword in the screenshots is called the "Brutal Eviscerator" and can be found in my "Unclaimed Delivery" mod, see Recommended Mods Section for link.


[b][size=5]Recommended Mods[/size][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6348/?]Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor[/url] - By Jojjo

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] - By Apachii

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17863/?]Reapers Dark Tower[/url] - By Reaper9111

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37204/?]Unclaimed Delivery[/url] - By SkyrimForDaWin


[b][size=5]Videos[/size][/b]
[youtube]WIwPc5yb084[/youtube]

[b][size=5]Required Files[/size][/b]

None.


[b][size=5]Install[/size][/b]

Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.


[b][size=5]Manual install[/size][/b]

1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the Meshes folder
.- the Textures folder
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".


[b][size=5]Upgrade[/size][/b]


Not aplicable at this time.


[b][size=5]Uninstall[/size][/b]

Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.


[b][size=5]Manual Uninstall[/b][/size]

1. Delete:
.- the folder meshesthat you have previously installed.
.- the folder Texturesthat you have previously installed.
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.


[b][size=5]Incompatibility[/b][/size]

None


[b][size=5]Known Issues or Bugs[/b][/size]
====================

The helmet does not support Argonian & Khajiit races.


[b][size=5]Future plans[/b][/size]
============

None


[b][size=5]Contact[/b][/size]
=======

You can find me on Nexus as: SkyrimForDaWin.

==========

NIFSkope - http://www.niftools.org/

Creation Kit

===============

Remember to ENDORSE the mod if you like it ![/center]
